TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 1036
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to D. W Smith, 01-15-1834

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to D. W. Smith, Monterey, January 15, 1834. Making arrangement for money while a prisoner.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1036

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to D. W. Smith, Monterey, January 15, 1834. Making arrangement for money while a prisoner.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Monterrey */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="01-15-1834">Jany 15, 1834*/date_mentioned**/p* *p**person_mentioned*D. W. Smith [Matamoras]*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Dr Sir I enclose you claims to the amt. of Seven hundred ninety six dolls six reals due me, that is two claims, one of 461.6 and one of 335. for money advanced by me to the *person_mentioned*troops */person_mentioned*in *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*, also Fifty seven dolls, three reals due to *person_mentioned*James Ross*/person_mentioned* of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p*Please present them to the commisary and get the money and remit it to *person_mentioned*S. M. Williams*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin Texas*/location_mentioned* when the *person_mentioned*genl*/person_mentioned*, arrives speak to him on the subject.*/p*
*p*Also I enclose a letter from *person_mentioned*Danl J. Toler*/person_mentioned* Call on him for the draft on *person_mentioned*Maurice Hebentreit*/person_mentioned* and get draft on *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*in favor *person_mentioned*W. S. Parrott*/person_mentioned* for my use and enclose it to *person_mentioned*Mr. Parrott*/person_mentioned* in *location_mentioned*Mexico*/location_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Mr. H.*/person_mentioned* told me in *location_mentioned*San Lois Potosi*/location_mentioned*, that he would make this arrangement.*/p*
*p*I leave tomorrow for *location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned*a *person_mentioned*prisoner */person_mentioned*on some accusation made by the *person_mentioned*State govt*/person_mentioned*. Write to me to the care of *person_mentioned*Parrott*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin */person_mentioned*[Rubric]*/p*
*/div1*
